name: Inline Alert
description: An inline notification banner with icon, title, and message. Lives inside content areas — not a toast, not a modal. Used for persistent contextual warnings, info banners, and error states.
notes: bg-background-800 border border-background-700 is the neutral base. Info variant uses bg-accent-900/20 border-accent-800 to create a subtle tinted inset without arbitrary blue/green.

variations.name: Info
variations.description: Informational alert using accent color for the icon — draws attention without urgency.

variations.name: Error
variations.description: Error alert with high-contrast styling and role='alert' for immediate announcement to screen readers.
